entry.title: Self-less
entry.summary:
Author: Cozybrain

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,899Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 20

Summary: Eddie Diaz has finally found himself. He is even finding the courage to declare his love to his best friend and come out to all the important people in his life.Eddie finally knows exactly who he is.Then one day, the unthinkable happens and Eddie loses all the knowledge of the man he's become. Without Buck there to show him who he is, will Eddie make it back from square one to where he belongs?Or: Getting together is so nice they have to do it twice, an Amnesia story
